title: Lajos Csordás
text: Lajos Csordás (26 October 1932 – 5 April 1968) was a <a href="Hungarians">Hungarian</a> <a href="Association%20football">footballer</a>. He won the gold medal at the <a href="1952%20Summer%20Olympics">1952 Summer Olympics</a> and was runner-up of the <a href="1954%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1954 FIFA World Cup</a>.
